long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fury Wars is an action-packed game available as a Chrome extension. Get ready for intense battles and adrenaline-pumping action as you compete against players from around the world. In this game, you take on the role of a skilled warrior armed with powerful weapons. Engage in fast-paced multiplayer matches and showcase your shooting skills as you aim to eliminate your opponents and dominate the battlefield. The game offers various game modes, including team battles and free-for-all, where you can test your strategies and reflexes. Experience the thrill of combat and unlock new weapons and upgrades as you progress. You can play "Fury Wars" for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/. Prepare for epic battles and become the ultimate champion in this exciting Chrome extension game!


*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://classroom-6x.org, https://poki.ee
